summary: Implements core utilities for computing the graph edit distance between two DGL graphs, including data structures for search tree nodes, construction of node and edge cost matrices, and a suite of exact and approximate algorithms (A* search, beam search, bipartite assignment, Hausdorff matching) to determine the minimal edit operations needed to transform one graph into another.
business_intent: Provides a reusable toolkit for researchers and developers to quantify similarity between graph-structured data, supporting graph matching, pattern recognition, and evaluation of graph-generating models within PyTorch workflows.
